comments.comment: I LOVE hanging out at Dolores Park. Whether you're celebrating a birthday or just soaking in the sun, there's something for everyone here!
Ice skating at Union Square during the holidays is one of my favorite SF activities! The area is nicely decorated, it's sure to get you in a merry spirit!
Beacon is one of my favorite coffee shops in North Beach. I enjoy grabbing a latte and heading up to Coit Tower for a beautiful view.
The Alcatraz night tour is very organized, informative, and interesting. Just be sure to bring a jacket, it's very windy!
Golden Gate Park is basically California's version of Central Park. It's HUGE and there are so many things you can do - go to the Botanical Gardens, visit a museum, or lounge on the grass.
